mapper.sql: id, pid, name, value, icon, type, uri, status, create_time, sort
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_role_permission r LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON r.permission_id = p.id WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId}

select distinct m.id , pid, name, uri, `value`,`type`,icon,sort,create_time from sys_permission m left join sys_role_permission rm on m.id = rm.permission_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.admin_id = #{id} and m.type in(0,1) order by m.sort
